problems.title: Battery Lights Blinking / Not Charging
problems.description: Specific blink patterns on the battery.
possible_causes: First and third lights flashing: Temperature issue
solution_steps: If temp issue, let cool for 45 mins.
If battery won't hold charge after 2 years, replace it.

problems.title: Loss of Suction / Motor Whine
problems.description: High pitched whine and no pickup.
solution_steps: Wash the foam/felt filters under the dust cup.
Access the HEPA filter near the handle and clean it.
